flawed_nl_solution:
If Isabella has $15 more than Giselle, she has $120+$15 = $315
Combined, Isabella and Giselle has $315+$120=$<<315+120=435>>435
Isabella has $45 more than Sam, meaning Sam has $315-$45=$270
Together, Sam, Isabella, and Giselle has $435+$270=$<<435+270=705>>705
if they donate the money to 3 shoppers at their local town's supermarket who then decides to share it equally, each shopper will receive $705/3=$<<705/3=235>>235
#### 235

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 135, not 315. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
